about_the_game:
Craftomation 101 Art Pack contains more than 90 images drawn during the whole development process: pictures of all existing robots, never shown publicly before, first-day sketches, and unique wallpapers.

By purchasing this Art Pack, you're supporting the game's development and gaining access to exclusive content that has been carefully curated for you.

To find the downloaded files, click the Right Mouse Button on the game in your Steam Library > Properties > Installed Files > Browse. You will find all the downloaded files in directories over there.
